name: Bomber 95
description:
Bomber 95 is the recreation of old school bomberman like game. With the ability to play with friends on one PC or over the Internet or both of those simultaneously. Nine unique levels with their own features, a lot of blow-ups and power-ups that can change gameplay balance instantly. Defeat them all and dance floor is yours!Features:
  • Up to nine players
  • Ability to play hot seat with friends and with online players simultaneously
  • Nine unique levels with their own features
  • Power-ups that can significantly change gameplay balance
